Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit you. I am offering this remarkable item to you at an exclusive price of $11,500. This offer represents a strategic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, ensuring both efficiency and cost-effectiveness. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
